Translations.Text: Imdanen, ma iwwet iten wugur, ad naaoen Mass nnsen, d imvuaen iS. Sinna, ma Iseess asen aeunu, s$uoeS, a pwaliv arbaa degsen pcaraken i Mass nnsen
iwakken ad nekoen i sen Nefka. Zhut! Deqqal a ppeeoem
Ne$ Nessader asen ed amvebbeo, i ipmeslayen $ef wayen i S pcaraken
Mi Neseess aeunu i imdanen, ad ceoeen yis. Ma teuza ten tucmip, seg wayen id urwen ifassen nnsen, ad aysen
Day ur walan ara ar Oebbi Issugut ooeeq i win i S ihwan, u Iwezzen. Deg waya, s tidep, issekniyen i ugdud iumnen
Efk as leeqq is i llezm ik, i ume$bun, i win id ibbwi ubrid. Ppif akka i wid ib$an udem n Oebbi. D widak ay d imerbae
Ayen teppakem n rrba, iwakken ad issem$weo ayla n medden, ar Oebbi ur issim$uo ara. Ayen tepzekkim $ef udem n Oebbi, d ayen ara ibuoekten
Oebbi, ikwen id Ixelqen, sinna, ikwen I$aten, sinna, ara kwen In$en, sinna, ara kwen id Issidren. Day ara ixdem kra, seg waya, yiwen seg wid tepcarakem? Gedha s yiS, Aalayan sennig wid pcaraken
Iveho ed lefsad di lberr u di yill seg wayen id urwen ifassen n medden, iwakken ad Isukk fellasen kra seg wayen xedmen, amar a d u$alen s abrid
